verses.name: 2 Kings 19:16
verses.text: Lord, bow down thine ear, and hear: open, Lord, thine eyes, and see: and hear the words of Sennacherib, which hath sent him to reproach the living God.

verses.name: 2 Kings 19:17
verses.text: Of a truth, Lord, the kings of Assyria have destroyed the nations and their lands,

verses.name: 2 Kings 19:18
verses.text: And have cast their gods into the fire: for they were no gods, but the work of men’s hands, wood and stone: therefore they have destroyed them.
